query.statement:
SELECT A.POSID ,B.ZSITE_NM ,A.ZBOSUOUT ,A.POSID_1 ,A.ZSPEC12 ,A.ZSPEC2 ,T.ZZSHIP1 AS ZZCHAKD ,T.ZZCOMP2 ,B.VDATU ,B.KUNNR_NM ,B.ZSITE_TEL ,T.NAMEP ,T.ZZLIFNR ,M12.NAME1 -- ,T.NAMET ,A.NAMET2 AS NAMET ,(SELECT SUM(PRO_R) PRO_R FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0112 B WHERE B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.PSPID = A.POSID AND B.POSID = A.POSID_1 GROUP BY B.MANDT,B.PSPID,B.POSID ) PRO_R ,T.ZZDAT01 ,T.ZZJUNGD ,A.ZBEPJEO ,A.ZQEGEMSA ,B.ZMAN_NM ,ZTEL ,B.ADDR1 || ' ' || B.ADDR2 AS TEXT30 ,A.TXT30 ,A.TXT04 ,(SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE M28 WHERE M28.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M28.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND M28.LANG = #G_LANG# AND M28.CODE2 = A.ZZACTSS) ZZACTSS
,VALUE((SELECT X.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.PSPID = A.POSID AND X.SEQNO = '001' ), '' ) AS O_TH ,VALUE((SELECT X.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.PSPID = A.POSID AND X.SEQNO = '002' ), '' ) AS T_TH ,(CASE WHEN 2 <= (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.PSPID = A.POSID) THEN (SELECT X.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.PSPID = A.POSID ORDER BY X.SEQNO DESC fetch first 1 rows only ) ELSE '' END) AS E_TH
,CASE WHEN X.LIFNRCHK = '1' THEN '직발주' ELSE '' END AS LIFNRCHK_NM
,CASE WHEN VALUE(Y.GUBUN1,'') = '' AND X.LIFNRCHK = '1' THEN '미입력' WHEN VALUE(Y.GUBUN1,'') = '0' THEN '미입력' WHEN VALUE(Y.GUBUN1,'') = '1' THEN '완료' WHEN VALUE(Y.GUBUN1,'') = '2' THEN '미완료' WHEN VALUE(Y.GUBUN1,'') = '3' THEN '거부' ELSE '' END AS GBN_0033 --,A.ZTEAM
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 B INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 A ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.POSID = A.POSID INNER JOIN (
SELECT BB.MANDT, BB.POSID AS PSPID, AA.POSID_1 AS POSID, AA.ZZSHIP1, AA.ZZCHAKD, AA.ZZCOMP2, AA.TEMNO AS ZZPMNUM ,VALUE(CC.NAMET,'') NAMEP ,AA.TEMNO2 AS ZZTEMNO ,AA.ZZDAT01, AA.ZZJUNGD, AA.ZZACTSS, AA.LIFNR AS ZZLIFNR
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS AA INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS BB ON AA.MANDT = BB.MANDT AND AA.POSID = BB.POSID
LEFT JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0011 CC ON CC.MANDT = AA.MANDT AND CC.TEMNO = AA.TEMNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 DD ON DD.MANDT = AA.MANDT AND DD.TEMNO = AA.TEMNO WHERE AA.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND BB.POSID LIKE #PSPID#||'%' --============================================
AND AA.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '20')
AND AA.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '20','91','92')
--============================================ --AND A.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '20')
AND (AA.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS# OR AA.ZZACTSS = '14')
AND (AA.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS# OR AA.ZZACTSS = '14')
AND AA.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND AA.TEMNO = #ZZPMNUM#
AND AA.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND AA.ZZCOMP2 BETWEEN #DATEF# AND #DATET#
AND AA.ZZJUNGO = 'X'
AND AA.ZZJUNGO <> 'X'
AND AA.ZZACTSS BETWEEN '01' AND '21'
) AS T ON A.MANDT = T.MANDT AND A.POSID = T.PSPID AND A.POSID_1 = T.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M12 ON T.MANDT = M12.MANDT AND T.ZZLIFNR = M12.LIFNR
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS X ON B.MANDT = X.MANDT AND B.POSID = X.ZZPJT_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0033 AS Y ON B.MANDT = Y.MANDT AND B.POSID = Y.PSPID
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.POSID LIKE #PSPID#||'%'
--AND A.TXT04 <> 'C' ORDER BY A.TXT30,POSID_1
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
